greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of partitions of n into distinct nonsquares.
link: Vaclav Kotesovec, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
mathematica: nmax = 100; CoefficientList[Series[Product[(1 + x^k)/(1 + x^(k^2)), {k, 1, nmax}], {x, 0, nmax}], x] (* _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Dec 29 2016 *)
program: p (k:ks) m = if m < k then 0 else p ks (m - k) + p ks m
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Aug 21 2003
ext: Zero term added by _Franklin T. Adams-Watters_, Jan 25 2010
